name: In10sects
description:
Warning! Loud Music!

Welcome to the most unstable and mad insect arena!

Become an apex predator by mastering different combinations of insect bodies and adapting to tricky situations.

Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee, throw dung balls, make some spider traps and even more! Get used to the change and become the arena champion!

Is it going to be a butterfly with a scorpion’s sting? Or spider throwing some dung balls with his beetle legs?

Every 10 seconds random will decide it all!

Controls are:

LMB - ATTACK (if a creature can attack)

RMB - SPECIAL ABILITY (sometimes can be passive or merged with movement)

SPACE - MOVEMENT ABILITY

Game was made by:

  • Moreen Tissedy (code)
  • Artem dove-of-peace Lebedev (code)
  • Andrei just-another-man Sharikov (gamedesign)
  • Yan silentium Uvarov (gamedesign)
  • Darja Yardykova (art)
  • Vjacheslav Sabbar Levin (story)
  • Undiy (music)

Stain procedural generation based on: https://github.com/keijiro/BloodFx

We used some sfx from https://www.zapsplat.com/ and https://freesound.org/
